location: Butuan City, Agusan Del Norte, Philippines
description:
I came out of my comfort zone to meet people online because this pandemic has caused limited movements for so long that I need to keep my "sanity" intact (I'm not crazy, just weird sometimes haha.....joke). 
I am a simple, loyal, kindhearted, honest and loving Filipina with good values looking for friends and possible partner (who knows?.... hahaha!!). I consider myself an extrovert because I can mingle with different kinds of people. On the other hand, I have my alone moments now that I am semi-retired. I spend a lot of time teaching myself the intricacies of the computer and browsing the internet for different positive and self-improvement videos especially when the pandemic started. 
I don't believe in love at first sight. I think friendship is the best foundation for a relationship. Ideally, my partner would be someone who is God-fearing, intelligent, decent man with good values; with good sense of humor, and has time for me; one with whom I can hold hands with while walking on the beach to watch the sunset. Please, no abusive behavior! 
You may write to me if you want to gain a new friend from my side of the globe.
